rooms.description: Large open space with Bohemian decor, natural light, and vibrant colors.
Adjacent to the living area, designed for family meals and gatherings.
Spacious modern kitchen with Bohemian accents, open layout for easy access.
Master bedroom with ample natural light and bohemian decor elements.
Second bedroom incorporating Bohemian textiles and earthy tones.
Additional bedroom for guest use or family member.
Fourth bedroom featuring vibrant decor and relaxation area.
Well-ventilated bathroom with natural stone accents.
Cozy study space integrated within the living area to maintain open flow.

openings.description: Inviting entrance in compliance with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy.
Access point for the two-car garage ensuring privacy and convenience.
Multiple windows to enhance natural light while preserving the Bohemian aesthetic.
